activities: Basis Science, Inc. (“Basis”), a wholly owned subsidiary of Intel Corporation, offers electronic fitness and sleep monitoring devices to consumers.  This Safe Harbor Certification applies only to the practices of Basis with respect to the personal information received from the EEA and Switzerland and does not apply to the practices of its parent company. In connection with a consumer's use of our devices, we collect the personal information described in our posted Privacy Policy. This personal data includes the consumer's email address as well as personal profile data that they may elect to provide; usage data sent to us wirelessly from the consumer's Basis product; and information that the consumer may elect to manually add to their user account. We utilize the consumer's personal information to provide online and mobile services related to the use and enjoyment of our products (as further described in our Privacy Policy).  Basis also processes human resources data in connection with activities such as (i) carrying out and supporting its human resources functions and activities, (ii) carrying out its obligations under employment contracts and employment and benefits laws, (iii) administering employee participation in benefits, compensation and human resources plans and programs, (iv) managing employee performance, (v) implementing compliance and discipline procedures, and investigating and reporting on employee compliance and discipline, and (vi) complying with legal obligations, carrying out investigations and for internal administrative purposes.  Basis processes sensitive personal information about its employees to the extent necessary or appropriate for compliance with relevant legal or contractual obligations, including managing attendance, employee records and employee benefits. Personal data is stored on the company's servers in the United States.
